column5: I want to build a carrying case for a snowmobile.  One to put on the back rack of the sled.  anyone have any ideas or thoughts?  Pics would help  Thanks
How about a Rubbermaid tote box, they come in all different sizes with tight fitting lids.
This topic is being explored a few posts down. Titled "Carrying my gear - on my sled"  http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=26603
